scripts.serve-prod: ng build --prod && gzipper --verbose ./dist && ng serve -c production
scripts.serve-aws-test: ng build --prod && gzipper --verbose ./dist && ng serve -c awstest
scripts.serve-aws-prod: ng build --prod && gzipper --verbose ./dist && ng serve -c awsprod
scripts.build:ssr: npm run build:client-and-server-bundles && npm run compile:server
scripts.build:ssr:awsprod: npm run build:client-and-server-bundles:aws && npm run compile:server
scripts.build:client-and-server-bundles: ng build --prod && ng run backedup-website:server:production --bundleDependencies all
scripts.build:client-and-server-bundles:aws: ng build --prod -c=awsprod && ng run backedup-website:server:awsprod --bundleDependencies all
scripts.ssr:prod: npm run build:prod && npm run server
scripts.start:prerender: npm run build:prerender & npm run serve:prerender
scripts.build:prerender: npm run build:prod && gzipper --verbose dist/browser && node dist/prerender.js
scripts.build:prerender:awsprod: npm run build:awsprod && gzipper --verbose dist/browser && node dist/prerender.js
